EmailTemplate.subject: Your menu change has been completed 你的餐牌更新完畢！
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
親愛的合作餐廳，
我們的團隊已將你的餐牌上傳至網站。請按以下連結預覽餐牌，如有任何疑問或意見，請盡快通知我們︰{!Case.Menu_URL__c}
如你需要更改餐牌，請以電郵形式聯絡我們，並將請求以以下方式列出︰
食品名稱 - 更改動作 - 資料
例︰墨西哥雞翼 - 更改名稱 - 火辣雞翼
如有疑問，致電 +852 5819 8997，我們樂意為你解答任何問題。
謝謝，
你的 foodpanda 合作餐廳服務小組
Dear Partner,
Your menu (# {!Case.CaseNumber}) has been completed by our content team and is now online. To have a look at it, please find the
preview link of your menu here and let us know your feedback:
{!Case.Menu_URL__c}
If amendments are needed, please send us an email and write the requested changes in the following format:
ITEM NAME - ACTION - INFORMATION
Example: Mexican Wings - Change name - Fiery Wings
Any questions? Feel free to contact us via phone under +852 5819 8997.
We are happy to help you!
See you soon,
Your foodpanda Partner Care Team
